title: Good Screen Recorder for iMac?

replies.body:
If you're looking for free screen recorders, go with Quicktime. Until OBS for mac is officially in version 1.0, dont go with obs.

If you're looking to waste your money, screenflow

replies.body:
If you want a free software to record with, you can use QuickTime. It's already in your Mac.

If you want a paid one, I suggest getting ScreenFlow. It seems to be the best screen recording software out there for Mac right now. You can edit your videos straight from there without actually going into an video editing software. I still use video editing software, though.
